name: Jill and the Beenstoc
description:
yeah so it 's like jack and the beenstoc but instead this time the jack got captured by the giant so jack can't come down to get away from giant because he so captured by giant so this means jill have to go up to do something about giant so they can go back to facing relatively normal hazards like steep hills

I hope this entertains you properly because this project represents another 2 and a half hours of my life that I will never get back maybe put on some music for to relaxing while you climb that really long beenstoc

reasun why giant blood is purple is because as you may know a some creatures have different kinds of blood like the human uses iron-based blood with oxygen absorption molecules called hemoglobin which is red when it swells up full of oxygen and it 's common for deep sea creatures to have hemocyanin which becomes full of blue and blue is better than red because it works better in very cold environments than hemoredness .now see the giant has blood that is purple because their blood has really big oxygen soaky molecules called hemopurpleosis which is very important because hemopurpleosis holds lots of oxygen and fills up very slowly and discharges very slowly which stops the cells close to the aorta of a very large creature from starving the cells farthest from the aorta hemopurpleosis is the only way a giant body can do that because if its heart were big enough to move blood fast enough for hemoglobin to work then its heart would be so big its other organs wouldn't fit so hemoglobin too impractical to build big creature

in jym class I never climb beenstoc, only rope because giants don't live on top of rope because rope too artificial and giants only like to live on top of 100% all natural substances such as beenstoc and Tarzan vine so yeah
